name: BodymappScannerSDK
summary: Bodymapp is a scanning library that uses depth sensor to scan your body.
description: Bodymapp uses the depth sensor in your mobile device* to map the external contours of your body and transform it into a 3D bodymesh that matches your true body shape. This means you donâ€™t need to purchase another device or leave the house to do a body scan!
